name: SMASBO
description:
the super good fightin game with the one character that happens to be my little brother's oc

This game is a parody of Super Smash Brothers.

If you want to use a joystick, use JoyToKey.

There is currently no way to finish a round, so just press esc to quit the match.

You cannot get points in this game (yet)

P1 CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Space/X - Jump

C - Basic Attack

V - Special Attack

B - Shield

P2 CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys - Move

Comma - Jump

Period - Basic Attack

Forward Slash - Special Attack

Shift - Shield
